alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 02 at 3:33AM EDT until September 04 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Ottawa county. * WHEN...From noon EDT today through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The flow coming in from the southwest will create the most dangerous conditions near the Grand Haven Pier with waves of 3 to 4 feet and strong structural currents.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
